Class CornerWinner

java.lang.Object
  CornerWinner
All Implemented Interfaces:
WinningStrategy
public class CornerWinner
extends java.lang.Object
implements WinningStrategy

Project Name: Bingo Game Lab
This class defines how a player can win by filling up all four corners with called numbers.

Created:
May 7 2015, Marc Kuniansky

Modifications:
May 7 2015, Marc Kuniansky, Modified to implement the WinningStrategy interface. Added the cornerChecker and equals methods.

Version:
May 7 2015, Version 1
Author:
Marc Kuniansky

 java.lang.String winningStatement()

isWinner

public boolean isWinner(BingoCard bingoCard)
Returns true if the values in all four corners are not marked. If any value in any of the corners is not marked, returns false.

Specified by:
isWinner in interface WinningStrategy
